title: Unlucky postman: Horror Quest in House of Grandpa

creator: Skytec Games
descriptionHtml:
You're going to figure out puzzles and disarm traps as you struggle to escape Doctor Crow's mansion with your life!

Backstory:
They say there's something horrible about Friday the thirteenth. But not everyone buys into that. Regardless, it just happens to be on Friday the thirteenth that Freddy Williams, a mailman, arrives at an old mansion with a package to be delivered. The mansion is on a remote street not far from a dark and abandoned mental hospital. Once upon a time, the mansion owner, Dr. Jason Crow, was a patient there, though nobody's really heard from him since. Freddy reaches out to ring the doorbell, and that's when someone or something pulls him inside. He loses consciousness. Waking up, he realizes he's locked in a den of evil and unable to get out. A foreboding wells up inside him.

Playing as Freddy, you have to figure out the secrets of the old mansion and get away. But you aren't the only one in the house. Someone else is there, and they have horrifying plans for you. Time's ticking!
descriptionShort: Stunning horror quest. Try to survive without getting caught by crazy Dr. Crow

descriptionHtml:
Hide-and-seek horror stealth game with chilling plot twists! An exciting thriller with interesting riddles and a frightening house. Let’s play a crazy survival action game! Enjoy horror room escape! Remember all horror films and feel like the main character.

The postman Freddy brings the box to the mysterious mansion and Dr Crow catches the postman. He keeps him locked. Good and evil will meet again today. The survival thriller game has begun!

Feel the deadly silence and dangerous maniac create a crazy thriller atmosphere. You're going to figure out puzzles and disarm traps as you struggle to escape Doctor Crow's mansion! Keep calm and solve hell's riddles! Become the winner in this deadly fight.

Run faster than the leopard and find all the clues. You will be useful dexterity and savvy. Speed up and save yourself from the butcher! Ahead are soul-chilling adventures. Pass the stunning quest to the end and be worthy of the title of winner.

Enjoy all the components of classic horror. Give yourself unforgettable impressions and transfer to the world of mysteries and mystical incidents.

Plenty of deathly riddles are waiting for you. Play exciting hide-and-seek action game with stealth elements and mysterious riddles. Your mission is to rescue your soul and stay alive! Enjoy insane thriller and scary puzzles. Find your way to freedom and complete our dangerous quest. Do not give up and organize a spectacular escape.

Stunning survival quest. Win this deathly game.

Experience all the horrors of the horror game Scary Mansion:
a gloomy horror quest puzzle;
cool gameplay and quality animation,
interesting riddles,
mysterious frightening locations,
an exciting plot.

Play in headphones and get the new experience the thrills of survival! Give yourself a few hours of exciting adventures in the horror world. Download the game and immerse yourself in a world full of secrets and mysteries.
